type.markdownDescription: Data type to use to index fields with string values for [faceting](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/faceting-fts). You can run only facet queries against fields indexed as the `stringFacet` type. To perform a normal text search on the same field, you must also index the field as type `string`. To learn more about this data type, see [stringFacet Type](https://dochub.mongodb.org/core/string-facet-type-fts).
